content: Gray-Bronze Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Blocking the pathway to the Ashen Pass II, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Gray-Bronze_Cart.md", under the primary heading "Gray-Bronze Cart". The content is presented below:

Gray-Bronze Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Blocking the pathway to the Ashen Pass II, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter.
